author: derksen mediaopt GmbH
label: Avalara
description:
For more information visit www.mediaopt.de

User Manual

changelog.2.6.1: Cronjob tries to commit every order independent from errors
changelog.2.5.2: Added net mode in avalara plugin
changelog.2.5.1: Fixed guest registration and added shipping include configuration
changelog.2.5.0: Plugin compatibility with DvsnArticleFixedGross + TaxIncluded calls on Avalara
changelog.2.3.5: Added configuration option to hide the discard button
changelog.2.3.4: ExemptionNo is replaced with CustomerUsageType (Entity/Use Codes)
changelog.2.3.3: Get Tax check could be restricted to certain countries. Bugfix: Handle vouchers with individual codes.
changelog.2.2.3: Change the way to calculate tax in case of a partial tax.
changelog.2.2.2: Bugfix: error on account->orders has been solved if there are no orders.
changelog.2.2.1: Make the plugin to be compatible with Shopware 5.4
changelog.2.2.0: Check basket for consistency on checkout completion is now optional
changelog.2.1.2: Leave only DDP option in incoterm plugin config
changelog.2.1.1: The 'Beta' has been added to LandedCost features
